text:
DNSFilter | Frontend Engineer | Full time | Remote

DNSFilter is hiring a full-time remote frontend engineer, anywhere within a timezone 6 hours from EST. We use node/react on the frontend. Bonus if you have experience with Electron, can read Ruby on Rails, and have design/UI/UX skills.

For full details, and to apply: https://www.dnsfilter.com/about/careers/ I'm Co-Founder and CTO - feel free to shoot me a message.
